Container.Name: All The Mods 9
Container.Overview: [b]All the Mods 9-0.0.54[/b][br]ATM9 for 1.20.1. Over 300 mods and growing by the week. Follow along with us while we update to the new version of Minecraft.[br]Version tags available:[br] - 0.0.54[br] - 0.0.51[br] - 0.0.50[br] - 0.0.49[br] - 0.0.48[br] - 0.0.47[br] - 0.0.46[br] - 0.0.45[br] - 0.0.44[br] - 0.0.43[br] - 0.0.42[br] - 0.0.41[br] - 0.0.40[br] - 0.0.39[br] - 0.0.37[br] - 0.0.36[br] - 0.0.34[br] - 0.0.33[br] - 0.0.32[br] - 0.0.31[br] - 0.0.30[br] - 0.0.29[br] - 0.0.28[br] - 0.0.26[br] - 0.0.25[br] - 0.0.24[br] - 0.0.23[br] - 0.0.22[br] - 0.0.21[br] - 0.0.20[br] - 0.0.19[br] - 0.0.18[br] - 0.0.16[br] - 0.0.15[br] - 0.0.14[br] - 0.0.13[br] - 0.0.12[br] - 0.0.10[br] - 0.0.9[br] - 0.0.7[br][br][br]Setup:[br][li]You must accept the EULA by setting the [b]EULA[/b] variable to [span style='color: #00E800;']true[/span] or the install will fail.[br]Optional:[br][li]You can setup a comma separated list of players who will have admin privileges in game by setting [b]OPS[/b]

Config.Name: Installed Location

Config.Name: EULA
Config.Description: Do you agree to the Mojang EULA available at https://account.mojang.com/documents/minecraft_eula? Server will not start without accepting. Set to 'true' to accept.

Config.Description: Comma separated list of players to have op capability
